hero.description: We are a global platform offering personalized lessons in Arabic, Islamic studies, and the Quran. With highly qualified teachers, we aim to make learning Arabic and Quranic studies enjoyable and accessible for students and parents worldwide.
hero.quote: Allah says: "ÙˆÙ„Ù‚Ø¯ ÙŠØ³Ø±Ù†Ø§ Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ø±Ø¢Ù† Ù„Ù„Ø°ÙƒØ± ÙÙ‡Ù„ Ù…Ù† Ù…Ø¯ÙƒØ±" When your eyes fall upon this verse, know that all meanings of ease and simplicity in your mind are embodied in it.
hero.quote1: Clear your mind with us, come with an open heart, leave distractions behind, and read, feeling the greatness of the words and the majesty of the Speaker. Register with Al-Fath Institute to help you achieve all this and much more.

INSTITUTE.TITLE: Al-Fath Institute for Arabic Language
INSTITUTE.DESCRIPTION_1: Our lessons are carefully designed to align with your individual goals, whether for professional life, travel to any Arab country, reading in Arabic, exploring Arab culture, Islamic culture, or religious studies.
INSTITUTE.DESCRIPTION_2: Individual language training at Al-Fath Institute helps you achieve your goals with the support and motivation of a personal teacher who possesses high competency in teaching Arabic.
INSTITUTE.DESCRIPTION_3: Enjoy interactive educational classes designed to build trust between you and the institute and help you learn effectively and enjoyably. Educational classes at Al-Fath Institute are the key to improving fluency in learning Arabic, memorizing the Holy Quran, and studying Islamic sciences.

header.title: Why Parents and Children Love Us

mainFeature.description: Al-Fath Educational School combines traditional Arabic and Islamic education with modern teaching methodologies, making it a pioneer in distance learning for non-native Arabic speakers.

descriptions.video1: Learn how to make the most of our platform in under 5 minutes
descriptions.video2: Discover powerful advanced features to supercharge your workflow
descriptions.video3: See how others have achieved success using our platform

feature0.title: Why Parents Choose Al-Fath Educational School
feature0.description: The school plays a significant role in instilling the foundations and pillars of the relationship between students, their parents, and the community, as well as its ethics and qualities. On the other hand, we see the community's support for the school and its assistance, believing in its importance and its great role in influencing the community's variables, directions, and future as well.

feature1.title: Arabic Language Excellence
feature1.description: Specialized curriculum for teaching Arabic to non-native speakers through innovative distance learning methods

feature2.title: Quranic Studies
feature2.description: Comprehensive Quran memorization programs with certified instructors and personalized learning paths

feature3.title: Islamic Sciences
feature3.description: In-depth Islamic studies curriculum covering essential religious knowledge and principles

FEATURES.EXPERT_TEACHERS_DESC: Learn from certified native Arabic speakers with years of teaching experience
FEATURES.INTERACTIVE_LEARNING_DESC: Engage in dynamic, interactive sessions designed for maximum retention
FEATURES.PERSONALIZED_DESC: Customized learning plans tailored to your specific goals and pace
FEATURES.ISLAMIC_STUDIES_DESC: Comprehensive programs combining Arabic language with Islamic sciences

registration.desc: At Al-Fath Institute, we strive to teach Arabic to non-native speakers, help them memorize the Quran, and study Islamic sciences. We focus on understanding the needs of students and providing a curriculum that makes learning Arabic easier in a way that suits their abilities, avoiding the challenges of traditional curriculums. We provide an educational environment that fosters their love for the Arabic language and helps them overcome learning challenges. This is done under the supervision of specialized professors from Al-Azhar University.
registration.title: Register with minimal information
registration.subtitle: Learn something new and build your childâ€™s future from anywhere in the world

firstName.error: First Name is required and must be at least 2 characters long.

lastName.error: Last Name is required and must be at least 2 characters long.

subject.headerSubtitle: Contribute to the future of education at Al-Fath Institute by joining our team of passionate and qualified teachers.
subject.headerQuote: At Al-Fath, teaching is about nurturing minds and inspiring growth. Become part of our mission to deliver quality education.

subjectCards.title: Islamic Studies
subjectCards.description: We seek teachers who can provide insightful and deep understanding of Islamic principles and history.

subjectCards.title: Qur'an
subjectCards.description: Join our institute to teach students the recitation and memorization of the Holy Qur'an.

subjectCards.title: Tajweed
subjectCards.description: Be part of our department teaching proper Tajweed and the memorization of the Qur'an.

subjectCards.title: Arabic Language
subjectCards.description: Help us preserve the beauty of the Arabic language by teaching it to our enthusiastic students.

cards.title: Arabic Course
cards.description: At Al-Fateh Institute, we make learning Arabic easy and enjoyable. We light the way to effective communication.

cards.title: Qur'an Course
cards.description: At Al-Fateh Institute, we make learning the Holy Quran an inspiring spiritual experience. We light the way to faith and devotion

cards.title: Islamic Course
cards.description: At Al-Fateh Institute, we make learning Islamic sciences an inspiring journey towards deep understanding. We light the way to wisdom.

testimonials.title: What Parents Say About Us
testimonials.headerTitle: Today's Children Will Be Tomorrow's Leaders and the Future We Must Invest In
testimonials.headerSubtitle: Al-Fath Educational School plays an active role in nurturing students and strengthening their skills within the community. As the foundational support after the family, the school is essential in educating, developing talents
testimonials.headerQuote: Many people may overlook the importance of Al-Fath Educational School and its significant role in community development, neglecting the idea of enrolling their children. Often considered secondary to the main educational system in their country, whether in America or Europe, the Arabic language and Islamic teachings may be undervalued. However, this neglect could affect children's Arabic and Islamic identity.

features.title: Why Kids and Parents Love Us?
features.mainFeatureDescription: Our courses are designed to be engaging and interactive, making learning fun!

accordionFeatures.title: Expert Instructors
accordionFeatures.description: Learn from the best with our experienced and friendly instructors.

accordionFeatures.title: Fun Activities
accordionFeatures.description: Enjoy a variety of fun activities that make learning enjoyable.

members.name: John Doe
members.description: John loves creating exciting learning experiences for kids. His passion for education makes him the perfect leader for our team!

members.name: Jane Smith
members.description: Jane brings creativity and innovation to our projects, making learning fun and engaging for every child.

members.name: Sam Brown
members.description: Sam's expertise in technology ensures that our platform runs smoothly and is always up to date with the latest trends.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: What are the qualifications of your teachers?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: All teachers are graduates of Al-Azhar University

QUESTIONS.TITLE: What is your doctrine of teaching children?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: Our doctrine is the doctrine of the Sunnis and the community, and we do not have any thought or belief that contradicts the word of God and the Sunnah of His Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: What is the nationality of the teachers in your school?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: All of our male and female teachers at the institute are from Egypt

QUESTIONS.TITLE: What are your curricula?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: We have our own curricula in the Arabic language, the Holy Qurâ€™an, and Islamic sciences

QUESTIONS.TITLE: Do you have education for adults or is education for adults only?
My son is very young. Do you have programs suitable for young children?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: Yes, we have students starting from 4 years old and teachers who specialize in dealing with these ages

QUESTIONS.TITLE: Does my son study alone or with a group?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: Yes, we have students starting from 4 years old and teachers who specialize in dealing with these ages

QUESTIONS.TITLE: After how many months can my son start reading the Holy Quran on his own?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: This depends on his ability to comprehend and follow up with him at home and with the teacher, but after less than six months, the student with us can read alone.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: My sonâ€™s schedule is very busy, so I find it difficult to coordinate a fixed time for class?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: We have a full supervisory staff working 24 hours a day, and their mission is to provide a convenient time for you. In coordination with him, he can reschedule classes for the appropriate time with you.

NOTIFICATION.ERROR: There was an error submitting the form.

Arabic-course.description: presents: Arabic Language Course for Non-Native Speakers
points: A comprehensive curriculum covering all aspects of Arabic: reading, writing, speaking, and listening, ensuring a well-rounded education.
A team of professional teachers experienced in teaching Arabic to non-native speakers, using the latest methods.
A variety of classes for different ages and levels, with a flexible schedule to suit families. Private classes are also available.
We rely on modern technology and interactive tools for an enjoyable and effective learning experience.
In addition to language, students gain a deep understanding of Arab and Islamic culture, reinforcing their cultural identity.

objectives.title: Course Objectives:
points: Develop Arabic language skills in children and youth in a fun and effective way.
Strengthen the Arab and Islamic cultural identity of the community.
Provide opportunities for community members to connect and share experiences.

Arabic-course.call_to_action: Don't miss this valuable opportunity to teach your children Arabic and enable them to connect better with their community.

Islamic-course.description: Al-Fath Institute offers a distinguished Islamic studies course for Arab children and youth residing in America and Europe.
points: A comprehensive curriculum covering various aspects of Islamic sciences: Quran, Hadith, Fiqh, and Aqeedah, ensuring a well-rounded education.
A team of experienced and specialized teachers in children's education, using the latest methods.
A variety of classes for different ages and levels, with a flexible schedule to suit families. Private lessons are also available upon request.
We rely on modern technology and interactive tools for an enjoyable and effective learning experience.
In addition to Islamic sciences, students are taught Islamic morals and values to strengthen their cultural and religious identity.

objectives.title: Course Objectives:
points: Develop Islamic science skills in children and youth in a fun and effective way.
Strengthen the Islamic and cultural identity of the Arab community.
Provide opportunities for community members to connect and share experiences.

Islamic-course.call_to_action: Reserve your spot now! Don't miss this valuable opportunity to teach your children Islamic sciences and enable them to connect better with their community.
Islamic-course.registration: To register or learn more, please visit the registration page.

Quran-course.description: Al-Fath Institute offers a distinguished Qur'an course for Arab children and youth residing in America and Europe.
Quran-course.why_choose: Why choose Al-Fath Institute's Qur'an course?
points: A comprehensive curriculum covering Qur'anic recitation, Tajweed, and memorization of various Surahs, catering to all levels.
A team of specialized teachers experienced in teaching children Tajweed and memorization using modern educational methods.
Flexible class schedules that suit family needs, with the option for private lessons.
We use interactive technology to provide an enjoyable and effective learning experience.
In addition to memorization, children are taught the meanings of the Surahs to deepen their understanding of the Qur'an.

objectives.title: Course Objectives:
points: Teach children proper Qur'anic recitation and Tajweed.
Help children memorize the Qur'an and strengthen their connection to it.
Provide children with a deeper understanding of the meanings of the Qur'an.

Quran-course.call_to_action: Reserve your spot now! Don't miss this valuable opportunity to teach your children how to recite and memorize the Qur'an, and strengthen their connection to their faith.
Quran-course.registration: To register or learn more, please visit the registration page.
